name: Not finish Dream
description:
Not finish dream is an endless runner game.

Sunny doll wakes up on a rainy night, someone is finding her and want she makes the rainy night change to the sunny day, but she doesn’t know how to do, someone singing a song “If the rain is still crying, we will cut your head.” so runaway, and don’t look back, try to escape here.

 If you can do that.
